forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 22C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. High 71F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Periods of rain early. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High around 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 69F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 21C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 70F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 23C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 73F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 68F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 68F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
